bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number, or major revision, of the processor

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Indicates whether the architecture is given in the feature registers

bitField.name: Primary_part_number
bitField.description: Indicates the part number

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the revision number, or minor revision, of the processor

bitField.name: L4
bitField.description: Determines if the T bit is set when load instructions change the PC

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Replacement strategy for ICache and DCache

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Location of exception vectors

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Instruction cache enable/disable

bitField.name: R
bitField.description: This bit modifies the ROM protection system

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: This bit modifies the MMU protection system

bitField.name: B
bitField.description: Shows the endianness of the CPU

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Data cache enable/disable

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Data address alignment fault checking

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: MMU enable/disable

register_group.name: MMU_OR_MPU
register_group.gui_name: MMU or MPU Control and Configuration
register_group.description: MMU or MPU Control and Configuration

register.name: TTBR
register.description: Translation Table Base Register. Pointer to the currently active first-level translation table.

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exceptions that occur while MMU is disabled

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a Instruction fault occurs

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exceptions that occur while MMU is disabled

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_I_D_MVA
register.description: Invalidate ICache and DCache using MVA

bitField.name: MVA
bitField.description: Modified Virtual Address format used for invalidate TLB single entry operations

bitField.name: MVA
bitField.description: Modified Virtual Address format used for invalidate TLB single entry operations

bitField.name: MVA
bitField.description: Modified Virtual Address format used for invalidate TLB single entry operations

bitField.name: Victim
bitField.description: Specifies the entry where the next hardware translation table walk can place a TLB entry. The reset value is 0. Each hardware translation table walk increments the value of the Victim field.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Shows where the subsequent hardware page table walks place the TLB entry

register.name: FCSE_PID
register.description: Fast Context Switch Extension Process Identifier

bitField.name: IWB
bitField.description: Remap select bits for instruction-side write-back region

bitField.name: IWT
bitField.description: Remap select bits for instruction-side write-through region

bitField.name: INCB
bitField.description: Remap select bits for instruction-side noncacheable bufferable region

bitField.name: INCNB
bitField.description: Remap select bits for instruction-side noncacheable nonbufferable region

bitField.name: DWB
bitField.description: Remap select bits for data-side write-back region

bitField.name: DWT
bitField.description: Remap select bits for data-side write-through region

bitField.name: DNCB
bitField.description: Remap select bits for data-side noncacheable bufferable region

bitField.name: DNCNB
bitField.description: Remap select bits for data-side noncacheable nonbufferable region

bitField.name: C_Type
bitField.description: specifies Cache type and if the cache supports lockdown or not, and how it is cleaned

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Specifies if the cache is a unified cache, S=0, or separate ICache and DCache, S=1

bitField.name: Dsize
bitField.description: The Size field determines the cache size in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: DAssoc
bitField.description: The Assoc field determines the cache associativity in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: D_M
bitField.description: The multiplier bit determines the cache size and cache associativity values in conjunction with the Size and Assoc fields. If the cache is present, M must be set to 0. If the cache is absent, M must be set to 1.

bitField.name: DLen
bitField.description: The Len field determines the line length of the cache

bitField.name: Isize
bitField.description: The Size field determines the cache size in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: IAssoc
bitField.description: The Assoc field determines the cache associativity in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: I_M
bitField.description: The multiplier bit determines the cache size and cache associativity values in conjunction with the Size and Assoc fields. If the cache is present, M must be set to 0. If the cache is absent, M must be set to 1.

bitField.name: ILen
bitField.description: The Len field determines the line length of the cache

register.name: INVALIDATE_I_MVA
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache using either index or modified virtual address

register.name: INVALIDATE_I_SW
register.description: Invalidate instruction cache single entry set/way

register.name: PREFETCH_ICACHE
register.description: Perform an instruction cache lookup of the specified modified virtual address

register.name: INVALIDATE_D_MVA
register.description: Invalidate data cache using either index or modified virtual address

register.name: CLEAN_DCACHE_MVA
register.description: Clean data cache single entry (modified virtual address)

register.name: CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D_MVA
register.description: Clean and invalidate data cache entry (modified virtual address)

register.name: INVALIDATE_I_D
register.description: Invalidate both instruction and data caches

register.name: WAIT_INTERRUPT
register.description: Drain write buffer then wait for interrupt

register.name: DLOCK
register.description: These registers enable you to control which cache ways of the four-way cache are used for the allocation on a linefill. When the registers are defined, subsequent linefills are only placed in the specified target cache way. This gives you some control over the cache pollution caused by particular applications, and provides a traditional lockdown operation for locking critical code into the cache.

bitField.name: D_Cache_Way_4
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 4.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_Cache_Way_3
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 3, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_Cache_Way_2
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 2, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_Cache_Way_1
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

register.name: ILOCK
register.description: These registers enable you to control which cache ways of the four-way cache are used for the allocation on a linefill. When the registers are defined, subsequent linefills are only placed in the specified target cache way. This gives you some control over the cache pollution caused by particular applications, and provides a traditional lockdown operation for locking critical code into the cache.

bitField.name: I_Cache_Way_4
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 4.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: I_Cache_Way_3
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 3, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: I_Cache_Way_2
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 2, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: I_Cache_Way_1
bitField.description: Locks each cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: DTCM
bitField.description: Indicates whether Data TCM is available or not

bitField.name: ITCM
bitField.description: Indicates whether Instruction TCM is available or not

bitField.name: Base_Address
bitField.description: Shows the base address of the Instruction TCM

bitField.name: I_TCM_Size
bitField.description: The Size field reflects the value of the IRSIZE macrocell inputs.

bitField.name: I_TCM_EN
bitField.description: Enables or Disables Instruction TCM

bitField.name: Base_Address
bitField.description: Shows the base address of the Data TCM

bitField.name: D_TCM_Size
bitField.description: The Size field reflects the value of the DRSIZE macrocell inputs.

bitField.name: D_TCM_EN
bitField.description: Enables or Disables Data TCM

register.name: RD_TAG_MAIN_TLB_ENTRY
register.description: Read tag in main TLB entry

register.name: WR_TAG_MAIN_TLB_ENTRY
register.description: Write tag in main TLB entry

register.name: RD_PA_ACCESS_PERMISSION
register.description: Read PA and access permission data in TLB

register.name: WR_PA_ACCESS_PERMISSION
register.description: Write PA and access permission data in TLB

register.name: RD_TAG_TLB_IN_LCK_DOWN_ENTRY
register.description: Read tag in TLB lockdown entry

register.name: WR_TAG_TLB_IN_LCK_DOWN_ENTRY
register.description: Write tag in TLB lockdown entry

register.name: RD_PA_ACCESS_PERMI_LCK_DOWN_TLB_ENTRY
register.description: Read PA access permission data in TLB lockdown entry

register.name: WR_PA_ACCESS_PERMI_LCK_DOWN_TLB_ENTRY
register.description: Write PA access permission data in TLB lockdown entry

register.name: MOVE_LCK_DOWN_TLB_ENTRY_TO_RAM
register.description: Move lockdown TLB entry into RAM
